select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from dts_activity_action_rule
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into dts_activity_action_rule (biz_action, biz_action_name, biz_type, service, clazz_name, trans_recovery_id, is_deleted, gmt_created, gmt_modified, creator, modifier) values (#{bizAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizActionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{service,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clazzName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transRecoveryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
